case.state: Hmm... I seem to have been transported to yet another new world in the middle of a puyo battle, but if this works like every other world I've been at, all I need is to play this game to fix it!
Hey you, stranger! I seem to have been transported to yet another new world, so I'll need your help to play this game so that I can hopefully get transported back home.
W... wait, a talking butterfly? I guess it's not that weird considering what I've seen but, doesn't that mean it will be out as soon as it loses one hand?
Well, it's going to be nice to solve a problem without having to play puyo or tetris for once...
This may neither be Puyo Puyo, nor Tetris, but I'm a fast learner!
Right! Let's poker battle!
Swap!
I'll place these cards on the hold space for now.
If you try to send me garbage cards, I'll send em right back at ya, dealer!
My calculations tell me that swapping these cards will give me an ideal probability.
Hmm... yes.. I'll take these ones and return these ones.
How about this?
Let's experiment!
Try one of these!
Certainly...
Tee hee.
Never expected my expertize on maths and calculations to help me in a situation like this!
I won't deny beginner's luck can always be a factor, and one I'll gladly take!
If I understood the rules and values correctly, you should have a hard time beating me this time.
Statistics tell me I should be safe with this hand.
I'm pumped!
I'll solve them all!
Perfect!
Correct!
Lucky♪
It looks like danger is out of this equation.
Even a novice can realize this is a good hand.
You better be ready for a big chain!
Ready or not, here comes my combo!
I hope you have a pretty good chain to counter this one.
If this hand was a tetris move, it would probably be the equivalent of a T-spin triple.
Lesson time is over, I hope you got a good score in time or get ready to lose.
Well, well...
This sure changed into a pretty good situation for me, didn't it?
At any rate, late is better than never, right?
Well, I won't say no to a good hand but, couldn't this show up earlier?
I may not have played poker before, but I have studied plenty theory on it, so I should be fine...
No matter the result, it's always fun to learn a new game to play!
Average, but statistics show that average still gives me a decent chance of survival...
This is by no means the first time I've been transported to a new world, this seems to be the one with the most perverted game though...
You know, I always wonder why our adventures always seem to start with someone being teleported to a new strange place...
It seems that no matter what world I end up at, there's always a game to be played, it's fascinating really.
Even on Puyo, there's a bit of randomness involved, just not as much as in this one.
This is fun.
I'm guessing this is the game people on this world use to solve all their problems, just like we do with Puyo back home?
Looking good!
That's helpful!
Not a bad experiment.
Strange, usually by this time I end up running into Amitie, or Arle or someone else I know... Could it be that this time I'm really alone for real?
I am playing a game of strip poker with people I barely know cause I'm lost! L-O-S-T ♪
And now I just wait to see if my chain worked.
Nothing fancy, but sometimes you just need constant pressure to make the opponent lose.
Hopefully this small combo will neutralize any attack you send my way.
Small chains will never impress, but they can get the work done.
Just a small chain to hopefully charge my fever meter.
Let's test this out.
Experimentation is always the key to new knowledge!
Don't think that just because I'm new to this type of battle, I'll be easy picking.
I don't know if this will be enough, but you'll at least know I am giving it my all.
As long as this combo is decent enough, I should be safe.
The fact that I have no clue if this is enough is kind of exciting you know?
This is like blindly throwing a medium combo to your rival without checking what they have prepared themselves.
I know this may not be the best combo, but it should get me through this hand.
A challenge to win, maybe? Maybe not!
While not amazing, the odds are still on my favor this time around.
I'm always up to a challenge!
Maybe this is just another one of those elaborate ruses from Satan to try to date Arle... Wait, would that mean he wants to play this game with her?! That's low, even for him!
Come on, don't fail me now!
Are you sure we can't change to a puyo battle instead of poker?
Oh, this is bad, this is bad!
Oh dear...
Well... so much for calculations...
Seriously, what are the chances of this?!
Ow ow ow ow!
Whoops...
I guess I'll have to take the next loss then...
Where is the gametype swap timer when you need it?
Odds are bad for me, but there's always a chance that someone will do even worse.
Classical, a nuisance puyo ended up blocking my chance to start a chain...
Danger, danger!
Nononono! Miss-drop!Miss-drop!
This might hurt!
I made a mistake...
How can I possibly resolve this predicament...
It was at this moment that I, Ringo Ando, realized that I was doomed...
What the f-actor?!
... I think I may have just committed a careless error.
Son of a digit!
Oh, boysenberry...
Well there go my chances this time...
Oh well, can't win them all...
Ow! Had I know this card would come I would had...
Back to the drawing board it seems...
Of course this card shows up after I swapped that one...
Boy have I, Aella... The question would be which one would you like to know from? Maybe the first one, where I had to learn to break Puyos to stop an ethereal creature from destroying the universe?
Hold up. You mean boats outside of the game pass by here?! It's enough to be like this with you people already!
Personally I thought it was a scandalous act whether you are famous or not...

Well, there's this one Dark Prince I know who I heard talking to Arle, saying how she should be grateful that he reseted the universe so that she could have a happier life or something like that, but honestly, he's had even lamer ways to try to get her to date him...
Well, I did bring this one little book to help me summon spells, but... I don't know if you'd be able to use it for anything so...

Thanks for the offer, Meia. But I've already had enough space adventures at the S.S. Tetra. At any rate, part of the deal with Marle and Squares to keep our memories about it was to not go up there again...
Well, I wish I could have an answer to that, but back at Suzaran High's Physics club we only ended up being me, Maguro and Ritsukuma, and he was there only cause he blew up the chemistry club...
Well, I'm, currently having Maguro teach me a bit, he is an excellent cook!
Heh! I knew I wasn't the only one that did that! Arash.
That sounds extremely dangerous is more than one way, Aella...
Thanks, Arash. But I already brought plenty apples from my world so I should be good for a while.
Hey, whatever helps calm your nerves, Shantae!
Honestly Jim, I'm asking myself that very same question right now...
Unscientific stuff, like YOU!!!
Huh... Don't pay much attention to it, Megumin. Some girls just prefer to shave themselves... down there...
Well, if he is to be believed, a certain perverted black mage claims to be over 180 years old, even though he doesn't look much older than me...

Well me and my friends do end up in a lot of adventures but not the relic hunting type... I guess there was this one time we had to find stars on pedestals to fix towns problems, but that all ended up being just a scheme of Satan to try to get a date with Arle...
A competition? Well, I could go the easy route and say maths. But here's a more unique one, vision. Mine is 20/4, which means I can see the Andromeda Galaxy, even in daylight!

condition.saying: Does anyone else want some cake?

case.state: Heh, Pinkie, you just reminded me of a certain suspicious green mage right now...
That's actually a pretty good question, any actual people from this world can give me and Stella a bit of info on that?
A net? Why would you even need a net to get cabbages?
Not really, I do know a self-proclaimed all-seeing divinator... Not that it ever helps her win Puyo matches though...
Greetings! My name is Ringo, if we are going to play this we may as well present ourselves.
This is fine, anyone can do a 2 chain...
Well, twice in a row is still recoverable.
Getting hit with a 2 chain is nothing new.
A 3 chain would scare new players, but I can still reflect this damage...
I am starting to get really nervous here...
Usually I prefer to see longer chains do damage to other players!
I may be winning, but it doesn't feel like it anymore. Luckily I still have one more trick up my sleeve.
Ah rats... was really hoping I could end this battle without having to get here...
Being in front means I can take a couple risks. I don't mind if it fails from time to time.
No perfect clear for me I see, oh well.
Battles without at least a bit of back and forth feel a bit empty anyways...
I may be in the lead, but I better stop playing risky or I'll regret it...
I need to be careful before I lose my lead.
You have to be careful when you are in front, sometimes you are just helping the opponents setup a comeback.
A calculated risk.
Nothing to worry about, yet.
Probabilities said this would happen eventually.
Usually I like an even battle, but then again, we don't really play strip puyo back at home...
I already am exposing more than I'm used to, I need to improve my plays.
Alright, time to change strategy, no problem.
Huh... I really hoped I wouldn't need to use my last delaying trick...
Well, I'm not giving up yet, I still have one thing to prevent further shame, and I think you may know what it is...
W... well, it has been a fair battle so far... so I guess I'll go with the rules...
W... well, I always play games till the end so...
Sometimes you feel you created a decent chain, just to see it reflected back at you...
Maybe I should have done a non strip practice game before this huh...
You guys are relentless on the beginner, huh?
It's okay. I just need to sharpen my attacks a bit more and I'll be right back in the game.
I can comeback from this, I'll just need to clear some nuisance puyos... uh... I mean cards...
Hmmm, luck hasn't been on my side so far, but all I need is a good chain to bounce back!
Careful, sometimes when you think you throw garbage you may just be setting me for a comeback!
As that strange fish from space would say. I need to "step it up!" I only have one more chance before... that happens...
You guys are not satisfied with my chest? Well I have one more thing to go through before you get your perverted prize...
I mean, I knew I was on an uphill battle here, but I really wasn't expecting to get here so quick...
Gang up on the novice why don't you?!
Sometimes, you just have to learn from mistakes you know?
Ideally this will be my only loss, statistically speaking though. I know the chances are minimal.
Statistics and probability tell me that this is unlikely to be my only loss, but one can hope...
Nothing to worry about Ringo, you still have plenty protection yet.
Luckily I still have a couple protection shields in case I get sent more garbage blocks, puyos... or I guess cards in this case...
Well, I gotta admit I'm starting to feel a bit nervous...
I rarely get out of this sweater in public, it is so comfy!
So much for keeping my decency, huh...
I'll admit this is getting further than I hoped, but I can't give up.
You can do this Ringo, think you are at Suzaran town's beach...
W... well... this is a challenge, but one I won't back off from if it helps me get back home...
So much for my cute puyo bra... and my public image...
You didn't expect me to keep the socks all game do you? I'll take off my wristband as well because I feel counting it would be a cheap move...
Before you say anything, I know I have my socks and bracelet, I'm taking both of them off right now...
I... I haven't ever done this in public... give me a second...
So... How does that one cliche phrase go again? "I won't be able to get married anymore"?
Well... the one thing I have at my advantage is that no one I know is around here to see me do this...
I know it's a bit hypocritical of me to mock small penises due to my own situation but... at least breasts aren't the main part when it comes to women...
You can't win a game without receiving at least a couple nuisance puyos.
A minor loss, let's continue.
Don't think all hands will be as easy, let's try again!
A slight miscalculation, nothing that can't be fixed...
I always love a challenge!
No matter... The more complex the equation, the more ecstatic I am to solve it!
At any rate, all that's well ends well...
I know this bra may be a bit goofy, but then again I wasn't expecting to find myself in a situation like this...
Why are you looking at me like... oh, right I chose the Puyo bra today, didn't I...
This is getting real risky now...
I know this will most likely come to bite me in the butt in the future, but I'm feeling a bit daring in case I lose again...
I'd prefer if people didn't mention anything about my size, I know I'm a bit on the small side...
In case you are wondering, yeah, I know I had options other than my bra. But I felt a bit daring, alright?
Concentrate Ringo, you can save yourself from total embarrassment still...
I really, hope the statistics lean to my favor permanently from now on...
Well, no more stuff to hide after this...
W... well, this certainly feels as exciting as the quests back home... even if way more embarrassing...
My head is a total mess, I feel so ashamed right now... but strangely excited as well...
This clearly is a game for the daring...
Oh right, our silent observer... ~name~, wasn't it?
W... Wait is that a... a G-GHOST?!!!!
Well, you certainly aren't the first guy I see on an extremely tight bodysuit...
I wonder where Tee is right now? Oh... Sorry. I was just reminded of a friend that also likes to use uh... questionably tight bodysuits...
Calculus!
Sine!
Cosine!
Tangent!
Integral!
Permutation!
Solved it!
Got it!
I may be out of the match, but I can at least keep learning from everyone else...
I'm ashamed to admit it, but I did hope this would happen...
Hey if I'm already so deep on this mess, I may as well ogle everyone else a bit...
Look at my current state and compare it to you, you have no excuse to run away now...
What you will do next is nothing when you compare it with my current state.
No excuses, not when I'm already like this...
I may be out, but I'm still interested in seeing who will win the battle.
Sorry, I guess I kinda distracted you by doing this didn't I?
Oh right, our silent observer... ~name~, wasn't it?
What even is that question, Streaming-girl?!
Really?! Even with this I managed to survive?!
That's what I call a last minute rescue!
Phew, I felt that really close...
W... wait, it wasn't me?! Yes!
I guess that means that... wait, what do you mean it wasn't me?
W... Wait is that a... a G-GHOST?!!!!
I wonder where Tee is right now? Oh... Sorry. I was just reminded of a friend that also likes to use uh... questionably tight bodysuits...

Sine!
Cosine!
Tangent!
Integral!
Permutation!
Solved it!
Got it!
I may be out of the match, but I can at least keep learning from everyone else...
I'm ashamed to admit it, but I did hope this would happen...
Hey if I'm already so deep on this mess, I may as well ogle everyone else a bit...
Look at my current state and compare it to you, you have no excuse to run away now...
What you will do next is nothing when you compare it with my current state.
No excuses, not when I'm already like this...
I may be out, but I'm still interested in seeing who will win the battle.
Sorry, I guess I kinda distracted you by doing this didn't I?
I can't believe it! We actually beat the odds to see a tie! Can we just keep our clothing status this time to celebrate this statistical improbability?
Whoa! Careful there buddy, I've been close to enough explosions for a lifetime thanks to Ritsukuma's experiments already...
You'll have to get to the perverted stuff at some point, for now just try to have fun!
Thanks for keeping this game wholesome for a bit longer.
We all have small trinkets to help us stay in the game, a smart choice to be honest.
Usually, accessories are associated with females, but did you know that statistically, the average of males that buy accessories is just barely higher than that of females?
When we put it in raw numbers, it doesn't matter what you take off, just how much you have still on.
Quick victories are tasteless anyways...
This game looks slower than puyo, so I'm fine with this.
Thanks for not going for something crazy yet.
Let the battle continue!
Take off as many as you want, I'll get victory in the end, I must.
I'm not finished yet.
This is the start of a big chain, just wait and see!
You think you may be safe, but I'm just setting up a t-spin as we talk.
And the battle continues...
Seems you had enough to neutralize any damage, but for how long can you last?
Next hand! You won't be able to delay for much longer...
Shall we move to the next hand?
At any rate, we should continue.
I guess I had no chance...
Kicking a downed dog I see...
I'll be back when I'm better...
Just like watching a chain keep going and going after you already lost...
You don't need to stack more garbage blocks my way, I'm already out!
I don't expose myself like this ever you know? So you may at least give me something in exchange...
Wait! You are not supposed to run away during a game! That usually happens before or after it's done.
Ah, a transformation, well that makes a bit more sense now.
You know, you kinda remind me of one of Amitie's friends, Raffina. Pink hair, obsessed with style, but knows how to throw a punch or two, you may like her if you ever meet her.
Heh, nothing wrong with trying to avoid to expose yourself for a bit longer I guess...
Tie, pervert! Go for the tie!
You'll have to get to the perverted stuff at some point, for now just try to have fun!
Thanks for keeping this game wholesome for a bit longer.

When we put it in raw numbers, it doesn't matter what you take off, just how much you have still on.
Quick victories are tasteless anyways...
This game looks slower than puyo, so I'm fine with this.
Thanks for not going for something crazy yet.
It seems the stack I sent wasn't good enough to cause proper damage, but no matter!
At any rate, any result where I don't get damaged is a good one.
If it keeps us both in the game for longer, I can't complain.
This is the equivalent of sending out just 2 nuisance puyos...
Hey, a hand where I don't lose is a win in my mind.
Ugh... Why do I even bother when we have already seen all of her anyways...
Let the battle continue!
Take off as many as you want, I'll get victory in the end, I must.

This is exciting!
Almost as exhilarating as setting up a big puyo chain.
Getting a 2 chain may not be very fancy, but it serves to keep you in game
Hmmm... I wonder why I got transported this time, there were no puyo experiments going wrong, and I doubt this is a case of dimensions merging again...
Usually Puyo battles tend to go faster... but I guess I'll take this change of pace for now...
Heh, if Amitie were here, she'd probably be saying something like "~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are are|is)~ so cute!"
From what I have learnt so far, this game isn't just randomness, try to stick to a strategy that will increase your odds next time.
I feel a bit awkward watching while being like this...
I don't understand, how did you manage to leave me so far behind?!
Huh... and then there's ~target~ still covered in so much...
I mean, it makes logical sense but, come on, look at my current state...
This is one of those long battles isn't it?
In the end, I end up with a 2 chain only...
It's like getting a t-spin but without clearing any lines...
Before we continue, I must strictly, and properly, force you to reflect on your fr-actions.
Focus Ringo, you are not done yet.
Right back at ya!
You know that feeling when you set up a big Puyo chain but mess it up with the last drop? That's kinda how I feel right now...
At any rate, shall we continue?
At any rate, if you are finished we can move along.

I'm doing good, aren't I?
Not doing too bad for a beginner aren't I?
At least I won't be the only one taking heavy damage...
I see I wasn't the only one who got sent a big stack of garbage, huh?
Hold on Ringo, you can still make a comeback...
I just need to think of the best way to improve my chances, before it's too late...
Better late than never I guess...
Huh... I guess I *could* take a bit of eye candy as consolation prize...
In a way... I guess this counts as a transformation battle...
One hundred percent!
A-plus!
Yes! I may have a chance on my first game after all!
You got em Ringo, now don't let up!
I'll need to keep sending nuisance puyos so that he can't recover.
W.. why am I liking this... am I turning into a pervert like Schezo...?
Sorry, I... I kinda was staring for a moment there...
Oh...
I appreciate the intent, but you really don't need to if you don't want to...
I mean, I understand if you feel the need to last longer in game but, I can't be the only one feeling a bit weird looking at this, am I?
Heh, it seems like your "fever" transformation time is over, huh?
Whoa! Whoa! whoa! Calm there cowgirl! Before you hurt yourself, or someone else!

S... should I be looking at this?
Well, you've seen mine, so it's only fair...
Concentrate Ringo, this is nothing you haven't seen before...
I know it doesn't matter that much for males, but this still feels a bit awkward to see...
Well, I guess I wouldn't mind looking at this for a moment...
*Nods slowly, heart racing*
Really? You are blaming ~player~ for this? Cause if you ask me, he doesn't really seem too magical to me...
I'm ashamed to admit it, but I do like this view...
Male chests, they are not supposed to be sexual by nature but yet...
Is a male chest really enough to get me like this?
Here we go again...
Well, I am certainly seeing way more than during most of my life today...
I almost feel like I should be paying to see this...
Back-to-back penis! I meant tetris, I meant tetris!
I... I have to admit, I've only ever seen Maguro's before...
Oh don't worry for me, my innocence died the day I first saw Tee and his... super tight bodysuit...
Join my shame, ~target~. Join my shame...
Well, at least I won't be the only one exposed today...
Listen I need something to distract myself from my own situation, so excuse me if I pay close attention to you right now, ~target~.
It really has come down to this for both of us, huh?
Just my luck...
A two block tetrimino? Uh... sorry about that...
E... excuse me if I look like a Schezo right now...
That's an I shaped tetrimino alright...
Oh dear! How do you live with that?!
That is one long tetrimino right there...
E... excuse me if I look like a Schezo right now...
That's an I shaped tetrimino alright...
Oh dear! How do you live with that?!
That is one long tetrimino right there...
Touching myself while he... This feels so dirty, yet strangely good...
Am I really enjoying touching myself while he does that?
Well I guess I won't be needing to ask for visual help here...
This adventure sure took a turn for the strange, huh?
No! Again?! Are you out of your vector?!
S... should I be looking at this?
Well, I don't know what to say, just be brave...
Well, you've seen mine, so it's only fair...
Concentrate Ringo, this is nothing you haven't seen before...
Well, I guess I wouldn't mind looking at this for a moment...
Well, considering how risk-fully low your dress was, I'm not surprised you didn't have anything below...
I guess that's technically not against the rules so, well played Videl, well played...
I know your struggle, but don't worry, it doesn't make us any less of a woman to be like this...
Don't worry sis, I know how you feel...
Not much to show, but then again...
Well, at least I know I won't be alone here...
Mini puyos can still be effective you know?
Gah! Why are you even looking there, Cynthia?! I mean I know the game is perverted by design, but couldn't you at least try to dissimulate a bit?!
Well, I guess at least this is not the first time I run into a pervert...
Nothing I didn't see back at Suzaran high...
Decently sized puyos...
That's a pair of puyos alright...
Yeah yeah we get it, breasts, now can we please move along?
Heh, I guess you must have pretenders everywhere, huh?
Whoa, they didn't tell me there would be giant puyos in this battle!
Sure they are big, but do they feel good? N... not meaning to say that I want to.. touch them... of course...
You know, for some strange reason, big chests seem to be a rarity back home, is it the same here?
Here's a joke to distract you from this. What did the mermaid wear to math class? An alge-bra!
*Louder than average scream of pure shock*
And there goes the purple pervert again...
And there goes the strange kid doodle thingy again, why is that thing even here again?
(W... wait, what kind of woman would need to write that down on their own body...?)
Keep holding on sis, remember you are doing this to help me get back home...
Sorry about this...
I wish it didn't have to come to this, but I'm just following the rules of this world...
Don't look at me, I didn't make the rules of this thing...
If only I had held on for a bit longer, your sacrifice wouldn't had been in vain...
Join my shame, sis. Join my shame...
Well, at least I won't be the only one exposed today...
Listen I need something to distract myself from my own situation, so excuse me if I pay close attention to you right now, ~target~.

(Is she even aware that she's not wearing... Should I...?)
Nonononono! Please someone tell me she didn't just take off her panties as her first item...
(Well, it seems to be clear that I'm not surrounded by the greatest minds in this world....)
I bet Schezo would love to be here wouldn't he...?
Well, I won't deny that you are a cute one.
Well, that is indeed a vagina...
We barely met, and I have already seen way more of your body than almost all of my friends...
And... there it is...
Touching myself while she... This feels so dirty, yet strangely good...
Am I really enjoying touching myself while she does that?
Well I guess I won't be needing to ask for visual help here...
This adventure sure took a turn for the strange, huh?
It isn't as bad as it seems, isn't it?
A little late, but at least I got some company now.
You can still pull through, ~name~!
Hmmm... you sure are a colorful one, your attitude kinda reminds me of that dragon girl though...
Alright, you gave me a good shock earlier ~name~ but I'm sure you'll...
So... much... pink, to the point of almost making me dizzy even...
*Increasingly louder-than-average scream of absolute distilled terror*
How adorable, I bet Amitie would love those rainbow themed boots!
At any rate, I think we all knew those ~clothing~ would come out sooner or later...
Everyone uses footwear, unless you are an ethereal creature like Ecolo, or a weird fish guy, but then again they are just clothe-less all the time...
Just wondering, what do you usually prefer for your feet, something stylish, or something comfortable, I try to find a good middle ground personally.
Do you ever stop to think of how much what we use on our feet protect us? Neither had I before, but the thought just went through my mind.
I can't help to wonder sometimes how would clothing differ from what we use if belts had never been invented.
Careful there, I hope that belt wasn't necessary to keep you from losing another layer too early.
Some people use belts, others don't. Personally, I think they look a bit uncomfortable for my taste.
Heh, I guess if you want to count that belt as a separate thing, no one is going to stop you.
Nothing personal, but try to keep those socks a bit away, they may look nice, but usually they don't smell like that.
I know some people prefer to go sock-less, but usually that only ends up hurting my feet if I try it.
Some people seem to have an obsession with socks, and even more for the stuff they protect, I mean to each their own, but you aren't one of those, right, ~player~?
Technically speaking, feet have nothing to do with sexual stuff, that doesn't stop some people from getting strange ideas with em now, does it?
I'll do everyone here a favor and refrain from doing any "gloves are off" jokes here...
Why were you even wearing gloves here? We aren't doing anything that requires protection you know?
Were those gloves supposed to help you in some way today, besides delaying of course?
Of course the gloves would come off, I doubt anyone would leave those on knowing what we are risking here.
Aaaand there she goes... You know, it's usually rude to just leave a game mid way through...
Well, that dangling thing there sure makes that fact clear...
Looking at it from a far, using a toy for that looks so, uncivilized...
You know I may have gone around and gotten a couple toys for myself back at Suzaran town's less... public stores, I have yet to use any of them...
Keep this between us, but I may or may not have a puyo themed toy back at my room, I've never used it though, I swear...
If I have to be honest, the thought of using a vibrating toy may have crossed my mind a time or two...
At any rate, would you recommend using one of those? Just asking for a friend...
Ghosts are supposed to be unscientific, yet here I am watching one touch itself...
This makes no sense, yeah, ~name~ is most likely just a projection or something...
Spirits are not real, yet here's ~name~, doing perverted stuff in front of me...
I can't be attracted by ghosts, they are not supposed to be real!
This is just one of those strange dreams isn't it? Ghosts are not real, so there's no way one is playing with itself right now...
W... well I've read on how it works but... I... have never actually seen it happen...
T... this is really happening isn't it? I sure didn't expect the day to end like this... But I don't complain...
Listen, this is going to be slightly weird for both of us, so let's just do it so we can move on.
I've never seen anyone else do this so... I guess at least I'll learn something new?
At any rate, we both knew at least one of us would have to do this at some point...
This is looking more and more like one of those perverted magazines they sell at Suzuran's red district...
W... well, at least you should take everyone's eyes off from me for a bit if you are joining...
Listen, nothing personal, but I'm already reaching very far out of my zone of comfort by daring to do this so, let's keep distances while we do this.
And here comes another one to join me, how much more perverted this situation can get?
Go ahead, it isn't as bad as it seems.
I know you may feel shy at first, but it isn't that bad...
Trust me, once you get over that first barrier and focus on it, this can feel really good...
You already saw me do it, and if I could do it, so can you, believe in yourself!
Well, this is certainly going to be one of my more... "unique" adventures I see...
Not even my closest friends I've seen do this... well only one but... that was kinda accidental...
Listen, you focus on your thing and I'll focus on mine... you can watch if you want though...
At the very least I'll be able to copy a thing or two from you now...
Okay, we can watch each other, but please no touching, I'd prefer to keep this to myself.
This is not going to devolve into anything dirtier after the game, right?
You are doing it so... aggressively... are you sure you are not hurting yourself?
I feel so ashamed to stare, but I just can't seem to take my eyes away from it...
Do we all really do such funny faces when we do... that?
On the bright side, such personal moments are sure to turn us into close friends, right?
I don't think Ally ever had something like this in mind whenever she said "let's fall in love!"
I wonder if Ritsukuma even has anything down there to... no, stop thinking about that, Ringo...
So I've never been in a situation like this before, what am I supposed to do? Uhh... cheer you? Uh... yay?
This world has such odd rules on their games...
Just pretend I'm not here, I'll be doing my best not to look if it makes you uncomfortable.
Is it rude if I look? Is it rude if I look away? Someone care telling me what to do here?
I was wondering, exactly how common these type of games are on this world? I can imagine they are a bit rarer than Puyo battles back at my own...
The people on this world must be as perverted as Schezo to come up with rules as this one...
Huh... I can't stop thinking that if I mess up, not only I won't be getting home, but I'll most likely end up doing the same as ~name~.
I don't know if having someone else do this at the same time is making this easier or harder...
Interesting, maybe if I do that too...
I see you looking over here while you do that, it's fine as long as you let me look too...
I guess we both got it rough here, huh?
Hang in there buddy, we can both get through this...
Is it too creepy if I say that I would have liked to see that while I was doing it too?
At the risk of branding myself a Schezo, I kinda like what I'm seeing...
Having someone else play with themselves while I'm like this feels a bit odd, but not bad...
This is by far the riskiest thing I've ever done...
It's kinda odd to watch this while I have already done it, but I kinda enjoy it...
That looks like it would had been fun to see while I was doing my thing earlier...
I never expected to get such a close look to something like this without getting a boyfriend first...
You know? Maybe if we end up doing this again I'll open my mind to the idea of letting someone else touch me while doing that.
I feel a big bang is about to happen...
I... I never actually expected to see this so close...

Well, I guess I won't be going back home with my dignity, but maybe I can at least enjoy my time until the rematch?
Well, at least this should keep my mind out of the fact that I'm stuck on this world for a moment...
I really hope no one I know comes here in the next couple of minutes...
I guess I do need to do this a bit more often for my own health...
I'll assume my chances of this game transporting me home at this point are none, but I may as well try to enjoy it...
Oh... I am way more sensitive than I expected today...
I... I just thought, what if I end up getting transported in the middle of doing this?! I wouldn't ever be able to get out of home if I ended up at Suzuran town like this...
Hmmm....
When I said I was a fast learner, I didn't mean it just for games...

Ritsukuma would be so ashamed of me if he saw me right now...
Not going to lie, I'm starting to believe this game won't help me get back home...

I'll admit it, that was kinda, really, really relaxing....
Even with all things I've said, please never tell about this to anyone you meet that may know me, please...
If a word of what I did today manages to get back to any of my friends, I'll never be able to live it down...
I may make an attempt to uh... enjoy myself a bit more, once I get back home that is...
I hope at least I didn't look too awkward doing it, did I?
Hmmm, I wonder if any of my friends would... No, you dummy, take those crazy thoughts out of your head...
I sure hope this is a one off adventure type deal, cause I sure won't be able to do this with any random enemy I encounter...
Well, that's one thing I can scratch out of things I never expected myself to do...
If you ever end up showing up at my world, please don't mention this to anyone and I'll give you some fruits from my family's business in exchange for your discretion...
I honestly doubt this game has any actual magical properties to it, but it sure felt like it did a couple moments ago...
At this point, nothing I say will produce a net positive impression, huh?
At any rate, at least I can say I did like the rush of doing something so... risky, for once...
Well, I guess I better start thinking on what else to do if this game doesn't help me get back home.
That was perfect! But I'm still stuck in this world...
Winner every time! Hmmm.. but it seems I'm still here...
I enjoy a victory as much as everyone else, but it seems this game wasn't enough to get me back home, any other ideas, anyone?
I guess that'll do. Strange... I'm not back at home.
Still on this world after winning huh? I guess I'll need to investigate more...
I got to keep my dignity and win the game. And while I'm not back home yet I'm sure I'll think of something. So thanks for this fun experience!
Well, that was an experience, but it seems it didn't work, wanna try to battle puyo instead next time?
That was certainly something, but I think I'll stick to games I know next time...
Thanks for the game everyone, but it didn't help, I'll have to think of something else once I dress back up...
Huh... back to square one...
It was fun, but I'll probably need to try something else to go back home...
Well, that's game one, but back home problems never get solved by just one game, let's try again!
That may not have gone as I expected, but maybe a rematch will help me get closer to return, what do you say, ~name~?
Wait... Those names... You wouldn't mean the ones on that group that fell into my world once with the giant purple robot, right?
